articles.author: Barbara  Mcmahon
articles.title: When Sandra Bullock stopped being seen with her lover, Hollywood gossips decided they had split. Close friends - Daily Mail
articles.description: BARBARA McMAHON: While some men might have been tempted to use their famous partner's name to gain special treatment, Randall was the polar opposite.
articles.content:
Secrecy and discretion are hardly words you associate with bare-all, tell-all Hollywood. 
But for Sandra Bullock and her partner Bryan Randall, they were mottoes by which they lived.
While some men… [+11015 chars]

articles.title: How did Netflix know I was gay before I did? - BBC
articles.description: Tech recommendations can reveal more about us than we know ourselves - but how and why does this happen?
articles.content:
After BBC reporter Ellie House came out as gay, she realised that Netflix already seemed to know. How did that happen?
I realised that I was bisexual in my second year of university, but Big Tech se… [+5967 chars]
